欧洲与伊蚊的斗争：蚊媒疾病的威胁日益严重研究描述了欧洲各类蚊媒疾病病例的增加情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Europes-battle-against-Aedes-mosquitoes-forming-threat-of-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Europes-battle-against-Aedes-mosquitoes-forming-threat-of-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77c6b6ab-9adf-463f-8a5e-26560fdf64e2 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 05:41:00 -0400 Europe's battle against Aedes mosquitoes: growing threat of mosquito-borne diseases
面对挑战，东南亚消除风疹的目标延长至 2023 年研究描述了世界卫生组织 (WHO) 东南亚地区 (SEAR) 消除风疹的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Rubella-elimination-target-extend-to-2023-in-Southeast-Asia-amid-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Rubella-elimination-target-extend-to-2023-in-Southeast-Asia-amid-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6b1c067-ece9-4e23-a394-3c9b85f40bb2 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 05:16:00 -0400 Rubella elimination target extended to 2023 in Southeast Asia amid challenges
最新的 COVID-19 疫苗接种对预防疗养院居民 SARS-CoV-2 感染的有效性：研究显示保护率达 31.2%研究报告了国家医疗安全网络（NHSN）对疗养院居民的监测结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Effectiveness-of-up-to-date-COVID-19-vaccination-in-preventing-SARS-CoV-2-infection-among-nursing-home-居民-研究-揭示-31225-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Effectiveness-of-up-to-date-COVID-19-vaccination-in-preventing-SARS-CoV-2-infection-among-nursing-home-居民-研究-揭示-31225-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cf14114-40a7-4093-b437-ac213aad9039 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 04:30:00 -0400 Effectiveness of up-to-date COVID-19 vaccination in preventing SARS-CoV-2 infection among nursing home residents: study reveals 31.2% protection
公共卫生问题：监测电子烟销售是预防青少年吸烟的关键该研究评估了按产品、口味和品牌分层的电子烟单位销售趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Public-health-concerns-monitoring-e-香烟-sales-key-to-preventing-youth-tobacco-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Public-health-concerns-monitoring-e-香烟-sales-key-to-preventing-youth-tobacco-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dec6013-5b9d-4248-a628-59ab00c35c77 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 03:59:00 -0400 Public health concerns: monitoring e-cigarette sales key to preventing youth tobacco use
柏林经济事务参议员 Franziska Giffey 和国务秘书 Michael Biel 参观实验室技术公司 KNAUER KNAUER Wissenschaftliche Geräte GmbH 的管理层，这是一家总部位于柏林的著名高科技实验室仪器制造商。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Berlins-senator-for-economic-affairs-Franziska-Giffey-and-state-secretary-Michael-Biel-visit-lab-tech-company-KNAUER。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Berlins-senator-for-economic-affairs-Franziska-Giffey-and-state-secretary-Michael-Biel-visit-lab-tech-company-KNAUER。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abeb1a67-3aec-4ae7-9d35-b173769fdcb8 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 02:49:00 -0400 Berlin's senator for economic affairs, Franziska Giffey, and state secretary Michael Biel visit lab-tech company KNAUER
鼻腔去定植可使儿童 MRSA 率降低 50%面对大流行期间院内持续出现的耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌 (MRSA) 病例，新奥尔良儿童医院的感染预防和控制 (IPC) 团队开发了一种廉价的鼻腔去定植方案，该方案以前仅用于成年患者，该方案降低了感染率MRSA 减少 50%。他们的研究结果将于 6 月 26 日至 28 日在佛罗里达州奥兰多举行的感染控制和流行病学专业人员协会 (APIC) 年会上公布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Nasal-decolonization-decreases-pediatric-MRSA-rates-by-5025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Nasal-decolonization-decreases-pediatric-MRSA-rates-by-5025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a99bb453-5190-4d46-87fe-b124688d83c5 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 01:25:21 -0400 Nasal decolonization decreases pediatric MRSA rates by 50%
新的努力最大限度地减少了外科医生特定的标准化感染率2019 年，当匹兹堡大学 Mercy 医学中心 (UPMC) 的神经外科患者中发现手术部位感染过多 (SSI) 时，感染预防专家 Katie Palladino（MPH、CPH、CIC）与医院神经外科医生合作开展了一项多学科质量和流程改进计划这导致感染率在两年内急剧下降。他们的成功举措将于 6 月 26 日至 28 日在佛罗里达州奥兰多举行的感染控制和流行病学专业人员协会 (APIC) 年会上进行展示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-effort-minimizes-surgeon-specific-standardized-infection-ratio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-effort-minimizes-surgeon-specific-standardized-infection-ratio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db63a058-792f-42e5-b0d5-44b4416215f5 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 01:11:31 -0400 New effort minimizes surgeon-specific standardized infection ratio
医疗卡更新是解决医疗保健中种族不平等问题的潜在工具CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）的一组作者建议，为了解决土著和种族患者可能遇到的健康不平等问题，应在健康卡申请和续签时收集有关种族和土著身份的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Health-card-renewal-as-a-pottial-tool-for-addressing-racial-inequities-in-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Health-card-renewal-as-a-pottial-tool-for-addressing-racial-inequities-in-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61b5a08d-c935-40df-8eef-0a7ef2297f85 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 00:57:52 -0400 Health card renewal as a potential tool for addressing racial inequities in health care
创新的纳米流体装置可检测天然高浓度的单一蛋白质在不断发展的精准医学领域，对能够以极高的准确性和特异性测量生物分子的方法的需求至关重要。认识到这一点，大阪都立大学工学研究生院的严旭副教授和他的国际研究团队在这个方向上迈出了一大步。他们开发了一种创新的纳米流体装置，能够随机捕获单个蛋白质并以数字方式检测它们的自然高浓度。这一突破可能为未来个性化疾病预防和治疗奠定基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Innovative-nanofluidic-device-detects-single- Proteins-at-their-naturally-high-concentrations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Innovative-nanofluidic-device-detects-single- Proteins-at-their-naturally-high-concentrations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee6b83e9-b38a-4b33-b246-eb82200f9126 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 00:39:45 -0400 Innovative nanofluidic device detects single proteins at their naturally high concentrations
混合免疫和疫苗印记：针对 Omicron 再感染的强大防御最近的研究探讨了混合免疫和纯疫苗印记对 omicron 再感染的影响。研究结果表明，长期印记人群具有有效的保护和免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Hybrid-immunity-and-vaccine-Imprinting-Powerful-defenses-against-Omicron-reinfection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Hybrid-immunity-and-vaccine-Imprinting-Powerful-defenses-against-Omicron-reinfection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6ca99b7-c211-4d15-b992-60065c6c2c78 Sun, 25 Jun 2023 23:16:00 -0400 Hybrid immunity and vaccine Imprinting: Powerful defenses against Omicron reinfection
